segments.text: Hello , there . What can we do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I received some leaflets in the post from you , one of them talked about a new service you have where you can transfer money between this bank and securities companies . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's right . We have just introduced the program , but it's very popular already .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I also read that if the customer is a stock investor , which I am , it's possible to get additional benefits ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right again . We can provide a tailored consultation service for you , giving you the latest quotes from the Stock Exchange and help you to plan what exactly you do with your investments .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What if I don't want to come in to the branch , can I use the consultation service over the phone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , Sir . Via phone or Internet , any time , any place .
segments.speaker: S1
